reference: Banerjee, Anindya, Juan J. Dolado, David F. Hendry, and Gregor W. Smith, 1986, Exploring Equilibrium Relationships in Econometrics with Static Models: Some Monte Carlo Evidence, Oxford Bulletin of Economics and Statistics 48, 253-277.

Fuller, Wayne A., 1976, Introduction to Statistical Time Series (Wiley, New York).
Granger, C.W.F., 1983, Co-integrated Variables and Error Correcting Models, University of California at San Diego Discussion Paper 83-13.
Hall, Robert E., 1978, Stochastic Implications of the Life Cycle-Permanent Income Hypothesis: Theory and Evidence, Journal of Political Economy 86, 971-987.

Nelson, Charles R., 1987, A Reappraisal of Recent Tests of the Permanent Income Hypothesis, Journal of Political Economy 95, 641-646.
Nelson, Charles R. and Heejon Kang, 1981, Spurious Periodicity in Inappropriately Detrended Time Series, Econometrica 49, 741-751.
